gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 110, Clippers 93
gameRecap.excerpt: Atlanta defeats Los Angeles, 110-93. For Atlanta, Dejounte Murray led the way with 21 points, 10 assists, and two steals while aided by DeAndre Hunter (20 points) and Jalen Johnson (18 points, 12 rebounds, six assists, six steals) in the victory. Kawhi Leonard finished with 28 points (three 3PM) with Paul George adding 26 points, six rebounds, and four steals for Los Angeles in the losing effort. Atlanta improves to 30-37, while Los Angeles moves to 42-25 in the loss.
